response.question:
// This is a decade counter that counts from 0 through 9, inclusive. It counts only when slowena is high.
module count_slow(input clk, input slowena, input reset, output reg [3:0] q);
outputs:
module count_slow(
    input clk,
    input slowena,
    input reset,
    output reg [3:0] q
);

always @(posedge clk or posedge reset) begin
    if (reset) begin
        q <= 0;
    end else if (slowena) begin
        q <= q + 1;
    end
end

endmodule

);

                end

                    next_state = IDLE;

S10:

begin
next_state <= S101;
end
else

end
end
S101:

next_state <= IDLE;
end
endcase

module advshift(input clk,
input load,
input ena,
input [1:0] amount,
input [63:0] data,
output reg [63:0] q);

always @(posedge clk) begin
    if (load) begin
        q <= data;
    end else if (ena) begin
        case (amount)
            2'b00: q <= q << 1;
            2'b01: q <= q << 8;
            2'b10: q <= q >> 1;
            2'b11: q <= q >> 8;
        endcase
    end
end

endmodule

response.question:
// This is a shift left and rotate operation
module left_rotate(input clk,input reset,input [2:0] amount,input [7:0] data,input load,output reg [7:0] out);
outputs:
module left_rotate(input clk, input reset, input [2:0] amount, input [7:0] data, input load, output reg [7:0] out);

  always @(posedge clk or posedge reset) begin
    if (reset) begin
      out <= 0;
    end else begin
      if (load) begin
        out <= data << amount;
      end
    end
  end

endmodule

module left_rotate(input clk,input reset,input [2:0] amount,input [7:0] data,input load,output reg [7:0] out);

always @(posedge clk or posedge reset) begin
    if(reset) begin
        out <= 8'b0;
    end
    else begin
        if(load) begin
            out <= data;
        end
        else begin
            out <= {data[amount-1:0],data[7:amount]};
        end
    end
end

endmodule

module left_rotate(input clk,input reset,input [2:0] amount,input [7:0] data,input load,output reg [7:0] out);

  always @(posedge clk or posedge reset) begin
    if (reset) begin
      out <= 8'b0;
    end else begin
      if (load) begin
        out <= data << amount;
      end
    end
  end

endmodule

module ram #(parameter ADDR_WIDTH=6, parameter DATA_WIDTH=8) (
    input [DATA_WIDTH-1:0] data,
    input [ADDR_WIDTH-1:0] addr,
    input we,
    input clk,
    output [DATA_WIDTH-1:0] q
);

always @(posedge clk) begin
    if (we) begin
        ram[addr] <= data;
    end
end

assign q = ram[addr];

endmodule

module ram #(parameter ADDR_WIDTH=6, parameter DATA_WIDTH=8) (
    input [DATA_WIDTH-1:0] data,
    input [ADDR_WIDTH-1:0] addr,
    input we,
    input clk,
    output [DATA_WIDTH-1:0] q
);

always @(posedge clk) begin
    if (we) begin
        ram[addr] <= data;
    end
end

assign q = ram[addr];

endmodule
